name: Tiny Goat
description:
Want to GROW RICH? Can you TAP FAST enough? CLICK - TAP - BUILD earn cash every day and farm away - even when you're not playing!

6 REASONS TO PLAY TINY GOAT!

- SUPER CASUAL GAME PLAY Just keep tapping the screen. The perfect tycoon story!

- TAP & BUILD Build your farm, make money, herd animals, upgrade your township! Tap! Tap! Tapped!

- CLICK & CASH Casual & addictive idle clicker game play for players happy to click & pocket money every day! Grow rich!

- UPGRADE & GROW Plan your cash investments and level up your hay barn with multiple story upgrades

- UNIQUE VISUALS Flock of goat in your barn with a happy PET DOG to keep them in line, eagles to hunt with amazing 3D city visuals and farming scenery

- CHALLENGE FRIENDS Think you have more happy animals than your friends? Got more milk? Send them a challenge to see who has the bigger cheese!

Tap like a tycoon and clone as many tiny goats as you can (don’t forget to feed them hay!) to grow and upgrade your city to pocket MONEY in this awesome 3D game! A goat farming simulator like no other - animals galore!

3 SIMPLE STEPS TO GROW YOUR CITY
1. Tap to goat - (idle simulator mode when away!)
2. Research to win
3. Upgrade your milk factory to be the township tycoon story all your friends are talking about!

Challenge your friends to see who makes the best milk in this idle farming pocket clicker!
